summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2825, for the improvement of Madison Street, Marion Street and Columbia Street, each from Railroad Avenue to First Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by the installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb line on each side of streets, together with the installation of such poles, conduits, wires and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system.
